tip1.title: Hydration
tip1.content: Drink plenty of water in the 24h before. Hydrated skin takes ink better, bleeds less and heals cleaner.

tip2.title: Alcohol
tip2.content: Avoid alcohol for 24h ‚Äì it thins the blood and can worsen bleeding and final results.

tip3.title: Balanced Meal
tip3.content: Don't arrive fasted. Eat a nourishing meal about an hour before to keep blood sugar steady.

tip4.title: Comfortable Clothing
tip4.content: Wear loose dark clothing. Ink may stain light fabrics and we need easy access to the area.

tip5.title: Sun & Tanning
tip5.content: No fresh sunburn or recent tanning. Avoid strong sun on the area for the week before.

tip6.title: Sleep & Rest
tip6.content: Get a good night's sleep. Your body needs energy to manage pain and adrenaline calmly.

storyline.subtitle: Follow our journey of passion, art, and transformation

chapter1.title: The Beginning
chapter1.description: It all started with a passion for art and a dream to create a welcoming space where people could express themselves through tattoos. Every design tells a story.

chapter2.title: Growing Together
chapter2.description: Year after year, we've built a community of artists and clients who trust us with their visions. Each tattoo represents a moment in someone's life.

chapter3.title: Our Commitment
chapter3.description: Today, we remain committed to excellence, creativity, and making sure every client leaves with a masterpiece they love and cherish forever.
